content: kfb k to end 6 row 3 sl1 k2tog k to last st kfb 6 row 4 kfb k to end 7 row 5 sl1 k2tog k to last st kfb 7 row 6 kfb k2 place sm k to end 8 proceed to row 7 remember to make buds when knitting with contrast color stitch count between sm and end of row shown row 7 sl1 k to sm remove sm k to last 2 sts place sm k1 kfb 3 row 8 kfb k to end 4 row 9 sl1 k2tog k to last st kfb 5 row 10 kfb k to end 6 row 11 sl1 k2tog k to last st kfb 7 row 12 kfb k to end 8 repeat row 7 to 12 another 48 or more times reserve enough yarn to cast off ©copyright 2022 annie baker all rights reserved this pattern may be used for non-commercial personal use only it may not be used in any publication in print nor should it be reproduced in electronic/digital format without permission please do not share copy or distribute this pattern cast off loosely as follows working any contrast stitches through back loops k1 k2tog pass first st over second st on right needle *k1 pass first st over second st on right needle repeat from * to last st pull yarn through wet block as follows after dampening scarf stretch neck edge and pin straight smooth out and pin at bottom point allow to dry completely ©copyright 2022 annie baker all rights reserved this pattern may be used for non-commercial personal use only it may not be used in any publication in print nor should it be reproduced in electronic/digital format without permission please do not share copy or distribute this pattern
